zamintData.description: We will unite all Zamint under one racial identity by eradicating divisive attitudes and ideologies, promoting cultural and racial awareness through festivals, education and the media.
Establish a one-party system with the AFun Party, implementing a centralized government for simplified decision-making, implementing meritocratic leadership selection based on loyalty and ability.
Formulate a military doctrine centered on racial defense, invest and innovate in mass destruction technologies with unprecedented efficiency.
Invest heavily in R&D for technological independence, reform education with a focus on STEM for Zamint youth, promote innovation in energy, agriculture and defense, and establish a space program.

Promote Afunism as a way of life that emphasizes loyalty, unity and collective goals, reform education to inculcate Zamint values, history and philosophy, and eliminate influences within the community that are divisive or contrary to Zamint principles

zamintData.description: Encourage population growth among those who embody the ideals of Zamint, by providing support to families to ensure that children are raised with these values.
